name: io.github.snyk/snyk-ls
description: Language Server used by IDEs as Snyk Backend for Frontends

package_arguments.description: Enables Snyk Open Source - defaults to true
package_arguments.name: --activateSnykOpenSource true

package_arguments.description: Enables Snyk Code, if enabled for your organization - defaults to false, deprecated in favor of specific Snyk Code analysis types
package_arguments.name: --activateSnykCode false

package_arguments.description: Enables Infrastructure as Code - defaults to true
package_arguments.name: --activateSnykIac true

package_arguments.description: Allows custom CAs (Certification Authorities)
package_arguments.name: --insecure false

package_arguments.description: Snyk API Endpoint required for non-default multi-tenant and single-tenant setups
package_arguments.name: --endpoint https://api.eu.snyk.io

package_arguments.description: The name of your organization, e.g. the output of: curl -H "Authorization: token $(snyk config get api)"  https://api.snyk.io/v1/cli-config/settings/sast | jq .org
package_arguments.name: --organization a string

package_arguments.description: Adds to the system path used by the CLI
package_arguments.name: --path /usr/local/bin

package_arguments.description: The path where the CLI can be found, or where it should be downloaded to
package_arguments.name: --cliPath /a/patch/snyk-cli

package_arguments.description: The Snyk token, e.g.: snyk config get api or a token from authentication flow
package_arguments.name: --token secret-token

package_arguments.description: The name of the IDE or editor the LS is running in
package_arguments.name: --integrationName ECLIPSE

package_arguments.description: The version of the IDE or editor the LS is running in
package_arguments.name: --integrationVersion 1.0.0

package_arguments.description: Whether LS will automatically authenticate on scan start (default: true)
package_arguments.name: --automaticAuthentication true

package_arguments.description: A unique ID from the running the LS, used for telemetry
package_arguments.name: --deviceId a UUID

package_arguments.description: Optional filter to be applied for the determined issues (if omitted: no filtering)
package_arguments.name: --filterSeverity critical:true,high:true,medium:true,low:true

package_arguments.description: Optional filter to be applied for the determined issues (if omitted: no filtering)
package_arguments.name: --issueViewOptions openIssues:true,ignoredIssues:false

package_arguments.description: Whether to report errors to Snyk - defaults to true
package_arguments.name: --sendErrorReports true

package_arguments.description: Whether CLI/LS binaries will be downloaded & updated automatically
package_arguments.name: --manageBinariesAutomatically true

package_arguments.description: Whether LS will prompt to trust a folder (default: true)
package_arguments.name: --enableTrustedFoldersFeature true

package_arguments.description: Enables Snyk Code Security reporting
package_arguments.name: --activateSnykCodeSecurity false

package_arguments.description: Enable Snyk Code Quality issue reporting (Beta, only in IDEs and LS)
package_arguments.name: --activateSnykCodeQuality false

package_arguments.description: Specifies the mode for scans: "auto" for background scans or "manual" for scans on command
package_arguments.name: --scanningMode auto

package_arguments.description: Specifies the authentication method to use: "token" for Snyk API token or "oauth" for Snyk OAuth flow. Default is token.
package_arguments.name: --authenticationMethod oauth

package_arguments.description: Specifies the Snyk Code API endpoint to use. Default is https://deeproxy.snyk.io
package_arguments.name: --snykCodeApi https://deeproxy.snyk.io

package_arguments.description: show snyk learns code actions
package_arguments.name: --enableSnykLearnCodeActions true

package_arguments.description: show quickfixes for supported OSS package manager issues
package_arguments.name: --enableSnykOSSQuickFixCodeActions true

package_arguments.description: show code actions to open issue descriptions
package_arguments.name: --enableSnykOpenBrowserActions false

package_arguments.description: only display issues that are not new and thus not on the base branch
package_arguments.name: --enableDeltaFindings false

package_arguments.description: the protocol version a client needs
package_arguments.name: --requiredProtocolVersion 14

package_arguments.description: 0-3 with 0 the lowest verbosity. 0: off, 1: only description, 2: description & details 3: complete (default)
package_arguments.name: --hoverVerbosity 1

package_arguments.description: plain = plain, markdown = md (default) or html = HTML
package_arguments.name: --outputFormat md

package_arguments.description: Any extra params for Open Source scans using the Snyk CLI, separated by spaces
package_arguments.name: --additionalParams --all-projects

package_arguments.description: Additional environment variables, separated by semicolons
package_arguments.name: --additionalEnv MAVEN_OPTS=-Djava.awt.headless=true;FOO=BAR

package_arguments.description: An array of folder that should be trusted
package_arguments.name: --trustedFolders /a/trusted/path,/another/trusted/path

package_arguments.description: an array of folder configurations, defining the desired base branch of a workspaceFolder
package_arguments.name: --folderConfigs baseBranch:main,folderPath:a/b/c,additionalParameters:--file=pom.xml
